titleStmt.title: To the ministers and church-wardens of [blank] a copie of His Maiesties letters directed to the most reverend father in God, the Lord Archbishop of Cant. of the tenoure that ensueth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
Abbot, George, 1562-1633.
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
Overall, John, 1560-1619.

notesStmt.note: "Giuen vnder Our Signet at Our Court at New-Market, the 13. day of December, in the fifteenth yeere of Our Raigne of Great Britaine, and of Scotland the fiftieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
